sourceMeaningMnemonic: This was pure <radical>gold</radical> <radical>long ago</radical>, but now it's not. Someone got <kanji>confused</kanji> and <kanji>mixed</kanji> it with something else.
meaningInfo: You could swear this thing was gold a long time ago. Now it's a mix of different things.
readingMnemonic: It's <kanji>mixed</kanji> (and not pure anymore) because the <kanji>confused</kanji> person put it in that <reading>sack</reading> (<ja>さく</ja>) filled with various other things.
readingInfo: Since it was in that sack for so long, it just ended up getting mixed with the other stuff in that sack. It was gold a long time ago, but now it's mixed with everything else.
